alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:31PM MST until February 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts to 10 inches. Strong and gusty winds of 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 50 mph will cause areas of blowing snow and reduced visibilities. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with poor visibilities in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio...commercial television or radio stations...or your cable television service provider for updates on this Winter Storm.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
